====================
Variable declaration
====================

func x() {
  my_var: Int = 10;
}

--------------------

(program
	(function_definition
		name: (identifier)
		body: (statement_list
			(var_declaration
				name: (identifier)
				type: (type
					(identifier))
				value: (integer)))))

========
For loop
========

func x() {
  for (i: Int = 0; i * i < 10; i = i + 1) {
    
  }
}

--------

(program
	(function_definition
		name: (identifier)
		body: (statement_list
			(loop_statement
				init: (var_declaration
					name: (identifier)
					type: (type
						(identifier))
					value: (integer))
				check: (binary_expression
					left: (binary_expression
						left: (identifier)
						right: (identifier))
					right: (integer))
				inc: (binary_expression
					left: (identifier)
					right: (binary_expression
						left: (identifier)
						right: (integer)))
					body: (statement_list)))))

============
If statement
============

func x() {
  if (n % i == 0) {
    
  }
}

------------

(program
	(function_definition
		name: (identifier)
		body: (statement_list
			(cond_statement
				check: (binary_expression
					left: (binary_expression
						left: (identifier)
						right: (identifier))
					right: (integer))
				body: (statement_list)))))

================
Return statement
================

func x() {
  return 5;
}

----------------

(program
	(function_definition
		name: (identifier)
		body: (statement_list
			(return_statement
				value: (integer)))))

====================
Expression statement
====================

func x() {
  x = 5 + 5;
}

--------------------

(program
	(function_definition
		name: (identifier)
		body: (statement_list
			(expression_statement
				(binary_expression
					left: (identifier)
					right: (binary_expression
						left: (integer)
						right: (integer)))))))
